content: the stunning textures in this gorgeous crochet hat combine beautifully with a self-striping cake yarn like the gorgeous lion brand mandala the ribbed brim is crochet but looks just like knit a slip_stitch technique gives beautiful stretch and that classic knit look with just a crochet hook you may purchase the ad-free pdf version for a nominal fee here on ravelry or view it on my blog for free at http //saltypearlcrochet com/xo-textured-toque 1 1 http //saltypearlcrochet com/xo-textured-toque
